FuncDef: The login application command is used to log in to the application in the OAS. The login application command is used to log in to the application in the OAS.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an application.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
